nadaraja rawiraj ghathana naduwe 2 wana withthikaru wana luthinan kamandar prasad hettiaarachchi namaththa danata masa gananaka sita athurudan wi athayi ohuge birinda wallampitiya polisiyata paminillak kara thibenawa.wallampitiya polisiya ada (03) kolambaa athireka mahesthrathwarayata me bawa wartha kala athara mema pudgalaya shri lankawa thula sangawi siti da widesha gatha wi sitida yanna parikshana pawathwana bawayi polisiya kiya aththe.ehidi adhikaranaya wimasa aththe kotuwa mahesthrath adhikaranayen ha abhiyachanadhikaranayen warenthu nikuth kara aththe mema pudgalaya pilibandawa neda yannayi.

hawloks kandayama samanga polis pitiye pawathi me tharagayen lakunu 18 - 13 k washayen jaya wartha kirimata polis pilata hakiwiya.tharagaye palamu bhagaya nimawana wita lakunu 3 – 6 k lesa pasubamakata lakwi siti polis pila dewani bhagayedi wishishta lesa tharagayata awathirnaya wemin labu jayagrahanayata danduwam pahara 2k , uthsahaka dinumak saha golayak athulath wu athara hawloks pila ras kala lakunu 13 ta golayak saha danduwam pahara 2k anthargatha wi thibini.nawika hamuda pila saha yuda hamuda pila athara yuda hamuda pitiye pawathi tharagayen lakunu 16 - 8k lesa jayagrahanaya wartha kala aparajitha nawika hamudawa prasada lakunu layisthuwe thawaduratath thunwani sthanaye randi sitiyi.tharagaye palamu bhagaya nimawana wita lakunu thaththwaya wuye 8 -7 ki.nawika hamuda pile lakunu 16 ta danduwam golayak saha danduwam pahara 3k athulath wu athara yuda hamuda pila wartha kala lakunu 8 ta uthsahaka dinumak saha danduwam paharak anthargatha wiya.
